meanings.definition: A Muslim soldier, especially one fighting against non-Muslims.
meanings.sent1: The brave ghazi defended his people from the enemy.
meanings.sent2: The ghazi led the charge against the invaders.
meanings.sent3: The young ghazi tripped over his own sword during training.
meanings.sent4: The ghazi stood like a mighty oak in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The villagers cheered as the ghazi returned victorious from battle.

meanings.definition: A title of honor given to Muslim warriors.
meanings.sent1: The wise leader bestowed the title of ghazi upon the valiant warrior.
meanings.sent2: The ghazi was respected by all for his courage and loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended to be a ghazi during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The title of ghazi shone like a beacon of honor in the community.
meanings.sent5: The ceremony celebrated the new ghazi and his commitment to justice.
